job_title: Director, Alumni Relations in Pulaski, TN
pros: They are trying to provide a service to the local economy.
cons: Small shop, too many responsibilities, not enough compensation.

pros:

Great Management 
Great Personalities

cons:

review_title: small, positive, private college work environment
pros: casual work environment, ability to work at own pace and make decisions without overbearing supervisors, entire office is communicable, get to take company car home for personal use
cons: pay at lower positions is terrible compared to same position at other schools, extreme hours at certain times of the year (40-60+) with no extra compensation, position is looked down upon by rest of the college yet is the most important, no room for growth unless you know someone, lots of gossip and interoffice squables over changes.
